name: ExtendedUnpacker
author: piejanssens,thorli
about: Unpacks nested zip and rar archives.
requirements: This script requires Python 3.8.0+ to be installed on your system.
description: This script extracts nested zip and rar archives from downloaded files.

options.name: UnrarCmd
description: The command name or full path to the unrar executable.
If blank, NZBGet "UnrarCmd" setting is used.
1. If unrar is in your system's PATH, just use its name (e.g., 'unrar' or 'unrar.exe').
2. Otherwise, provide the full, absolute path.
Examples:
- Windows: C:\Program Files\NZBGet\unrar.exe
- Linux: /usr/bin/unrar
If blank, NZBGet "UnrarCmd" setting is used.
Default: blank

options.name: UnrarArgs
description: The static command-line arguments to pass to unrar.
Default: e -idp -ai -o-

options.name: SevenZipCmd
description: The command name or full path to the 7-Zip executable.
1. If 7-Zip is in your system's PATH, use its name (e.g., '7z' or '7z.exe').
2. Otherwise, provide the full, absolute path.
Examples:
- Windows: C:\Program Files\NZBGet\7z.exe
- Linux: /usr/bin/7z
If blank, NZBGet "SevenZipCmd" setting is used.
Default: blank

options.name: SevenZipArgs
description: The static command-line arguments to pass to 7-Zip.
Default: e -aos

options.name: WaitTime
description: Time (in seconds) to pause start of script.
(Gives NZBGet time to perform "UnpackCleanupDisk" action on slow systems).
Default: 0

options.name: DeleteLeftover
description: Delete leftover archive files after successful extract.
